metadata.title: CVE-2022-28487 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Tcpreplay version 4.4.1 contains a memory leakage flaw infix_ipv6_checksums() function. The highest threat from this vulnerabilityis to data confidentiality.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.4.1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.1-2ubuntu1').
